numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that China leads the world in pollution.
2. China leads the world in pollution by far.
3. China has more pollution than the United States.
4. Many diesel engines are sent to China.
5. These diesel engines do not have emission controls.
6. I ask why these diesel engines do not have emission controls.
7. The United States requires emission controls.
8. I think that the rest of the world should require emission controls too.
